metadata.synopsis: Astarion & Avatar partnered, Avatar wants to talk to Astarion about their relationship.

102.speaker: Astarion
102.text: Yes, my sweet? What is it?
102.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

8.speaker: Astarion
8.text: All right, let's talk. Who knows when we'll have another chance.
8.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

50.speaker: Astarion
50.text: Go on, then. I'll allow it.
50.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

133.speaker: Astarion
133.text: Can we? I suppose we can.
133.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

7.speaker: Player
7.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

49.speaker: Astarion
49.text: Nothing special, of course. You're only the first person who I truly care for.

40.speaker: Player
40.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

0.speaker: Astarion
0.text: Seven thousand souls have given me the power to carve out my own future, and I want you to be part of it.

51.speaker: Player
51.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

29.speaker: Astarion
29.text: I don't know. But isn't it nice? Not to know.

99.speaker: Astarion
99.text: You're not a victim. Not a target. Not just one night it's better to forget.

101.speaker: Astarion
101.text: But then... whatever in the world could you be?

97.speaker: Player
97.text: You made me your spawn... What is going to happen to me?
97.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

65.speaker: Astarion
65.text: 'Spawn' is an ugly word. I really do prefer 'consort'.

82.speaker: Player
82.text: Does this mean I won't be able to walk in the sun if my tadpole is removed?

124.speaker: Astarion
124.text: Don't you worry. You have supped of my blood. It will be no trouble to extend a fragment of my protection to you.

137.speaker: Astarion
137.text: Just don't stray too far. But you'd never dream of doing that, would you?

80.speaker: Player
80.text: Cazador could compel you - can you compel me?

31.speaker: Astarion
31.text: Why would I need to? You're going to be wonderfully obedient.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: What do you mean to do with me, as your consort?

96.speaker: Astarion
96.text: As much as I wish to sequester you in a deep chamber of my palace and keep you all to myself, there's much to be done.

18.speaker: Astarion
18.text: First we'll take Baldur's Gate. Then we'll take the world.

52.speaker: Astarion
52.text: We'll dominate it until the sun itself melts, and then we'll give ourselves to the night.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: Will you still drink my blood?

129.speaker: Astarion
129.text: Of course I will, and you'll drink mine. I can't wait to taste your lips after you've tasted me.

135.speaker: Player
135.text: There's something I want to ask about...
135.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

105.speaker: Player
105.text: You seem so nervous around me, at times.
105.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

92.speaker: Astarion
92.text: And can you blame me? You've hardly proven you're deserving of trust.

126.speaker: Player
126.text: Have you ever been in love?
126.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

25.speaker: Player
25.text: I promise I'll keep you safe always. You'll never need the powers of an Ascendant.
25.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

68.speaker: Astarion
68.text: It would be nice not to have to rely on you as my great protector, but... well, I do appreciate the thought.

75.speaker: Player
75.text: I'm an empty slate, free to do whatever I want with my life. I want all my life to be with you.
75.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

48.speaker: Astarion
48.text: I want you by my side as well. Now that you're free, we can craft a new future together.

122.speaker: Player
122.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

45.speaker: Astarion
45.text: Gods, yes. I've been waiting so long for this.

131.speaker: Astarion
131.text: And it was absolutely worth the wait.

62.speaker: Player
62.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

10.speaker: Astarion
10.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Lord] Responding to the player asking if they can kiss you. (Not situation specific - can be triggered most places in the game)

73.speaker: Astarion
73.text: Can't get enough? I'm not surprised.
73.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Spawn] "If you must." - Joking, delivered with a sigh and an eye-roll. "Oh all right, go on then, if you must..." kind of tone.

36.speaker: Astarion
36.context: NodeContext: [Vampire Spawn] "If you must." - Joking, delivered with a sigh and an eye-roll. "Oh all right, go on then, if you must..." kind of tone.

132.speaker: Player
132.text: I wish I could kiss you.
132.context: NodeContext: Genuinely thinks player is joking about breaking up - realises they're serious.

87.speaker: Astarion
87.text: You have no idea how mutual the feeling is. But there are other ways to connect with a person.

78.speaker: Astarion
78.text: And who knows? Perhaps some day you'll be free of that engine?

6.speaker: Astarion
6.text: Or perhaps I'll just decide some things are worth incineration.

117.speaker: Player
117.text: Whatever is between us, we need to end it.
117.context: NodeContext: Genuinely thinks player is joking about breaking up - realises they're serious.

46.speaker: Astarion
46.text: Oh shit. I - did I do something wrong?
46.context: NodeContext: Genuinely thinks player is joking about breaking up - realises they're serious.

111.speaker: Player
111.text: I'm becoming something horrible - I want to protect you.

110.speaker: Astarion
110.text: Oh, come off. You're wonderful. I don't care what you look like.

77.speaker: Astarion
77.text: What you cannot do is make my decisions for me. I've had more than enough of that in my life.

9.speaker: Astarion
9.text: I bet I still get more stares walking down a street than you.

116.speaker: Astarion
116.text: I am. And beautiful - not enough people mention that.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: I could end us both, you know.

54.speaker: Astarion
54.text: Cazador used his tortures to strike terror into me. But I've rarely been more afraid than on the night when I feared Bhaal had claimed you for good.

41.speaker: Astarion
41.text: But I trust you won't kill me. And if you do, then I've gotten sloppy and probably have it coming.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: No, I mean it. We shouldn't be together.

121.speaker: Astarion
121.text: If that's what you want... then that's where we'll leave it.

63.speaker: Astarion
63.text: Well... Goodbye, then. I suppose. You brought my dead heart back to life. It will keep beating.

21.speaker: Player
21.text: I'm so worried I'm going to end up killing you one day.

140.speaker: Astarion
140.text: I may be guilty of a bit of embellishment here and there - but I'm no liar. When I vowed we'd save you: we will save you.

136.speaker: Astarion
136.text: This little adventure of ours has taught me that we can't let our lives be ruled by fear. Or else we never really live.

12.speaker: Astarion
12.text: I'm not afraid. Not of you, not of your darkness, and not of our future.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: It's been a wonderful time, honestly. But it can't be forever.

114.speaker: Player
114.text: It's my decision, I'm sure it's what I want.

53.speaker: Astarion
53.context: NodeContext: Very arrogant Vampire Lord Astarion can't believe you're trying to break up with him

20.speaker: Player
20.text: You heard me. I'm leaving you.
20.context: NodeContext: Very arrogant Vampire Lord Astarion can't believe you're trying to break up with him

13.speaker: Astarion
13.context: NodeContext: Very arrogant Vampire Lord Astarion can't believe you're trying to break up with him

84.speaker: Player
84.text: You're controlling, manipulative, everything else you hated in Cazador.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: You're not the person I fell for. Not anymore.
5.context: NodeContext: Very arrogant Vampire Lord Astarion can't believe you're trying to break up with him

138.speaker: Astarion
138.text: I know, I'm better than he was. Stronger. Finally free of my past.
138.context: NodeContext: Very arrogant Vampire Lord Astarion can't believe you're trying to break up with him

71.speaker: Astarion
71.text: I'm who I always wanted to be. I have everything I ever wanted.
71.context: NodeContext: Very arrogant Vampire Lord Astarion can't believe you're trying to break up with him

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: If you're too stupid to see what you're losing, then you never deserved to have it in the first place.

95.speaker: Astarion
95.text: I don't have to take this from you, you ingrate.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: Are you really, Astarion? Or are you just a new Cazador?

44.speaker: Astarion
44.text: SILENCE! How dare you speak his name?

22.speaker: Player
22.text: I miss the sweet, uncertain boy who wanted to make a new life for himself.

89.speaker: Astarion
89.text: No, I thought not. Let's keep it that way.

3.speaker: Astarion
3.text: I don't want to hear anything like that from you again, my pet. You know I adore you terribly.

130.speaker: Astarion
130.text: I - I can hardly blame you. I don't exactly have much to offer right now, beyond new burdens to carry.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: You aren't really ready to have a partner.

123.speaker: Astarion
123.text: Would I were. It's true, you don't deserve this facade any longer.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: This just isn't what I wanted, when we first slept together.

64.speaker: Astarion
64.text: I was beginning to believe someone truly wanted me. But I shouldn't have deluded myself.

139.speaker: Astarion
139.text: From the start, I was rather counting the hours until it was going to end. Midnight chimes, eh?

70.speaker: Player
70.text: I don't want to be roped into all your trauma.

98.speaker: Astarion
98.text: You gave me precious, impossible moments of comfort. I only really wanted a few more.
